Dating: NAQADA II (not before); NAQADA; NAQADA III (not after)
Name: Palette in the form of an ostrich
Description: This cosmetic palette in schist dating from the Naqada II-III Period takes the form of an ostrich. Only the outline of the eye has been carved in the hard material. The legs, by contrast, are made of the stone itself . This example is also distinguished by a hole for suspension.
